column4: Does anyone here really know what is going on with the continued use of pulseaudio yet on distros that use it, like Ubuntu, have so many sound issues? Is it pulseaudio just not ready for primetime or programmers not writing code to use it properly or can someone explain the reasoning for basing sound on something that appears to be pretty much broken?
Im in 9.10, how do I get back my volume applet?
